name: SlimaGedon
description:
SlimaGedon

A turn-based game, where you have limited time to make a move. The remaining time will transfer to the next turn.

The slimes just keep on coming. First, they are weak, dumb, and few but then they get stronger, smarter, and more. Survive as long as you can. Points are awarded for each defeated slime.

Controls:

  • WASD to move 
  • target  with mouse 
  •   LMB deals damage to one tile
  •   RMB deals damage in a cross shape
  •  E travels in the direction your cursor is pointing and also deals damage.
  •   Q to gain a speed boost
  • Mouse wheel to zoom in/out

Moving faster actually means enemies are less likely to perform an action. Slimes can deal damage when close. The color of a slime determines its stats.

This is my first ever game. Except for some sound effects, everything was made with PyGame and Paint by myself.
